Function reference

All functions

add_dummy_from_dummies()
Add a dummy variable from dummies (if any is 1)
add_dummy_from_set()
Add a dummy variable when any string from a set of strings
add_roster_wgq_ss()
Add summarized individual WG-SS data to the household data
are_cols_numeric()
Stop statement values are not numeric
are_values_in_range()
Stop statement values are not in range
are_values_in_set()
Stop statement values are not in set
fclcp()
FEWS NET Food Consumption-Livelihood Coping Phase
fcm_cell()
FEWS NET Food Consumption Matrix cell
fcp()
FC phase - Food Consumption phase according to the FCM
fcs()
FCS - Food Consumption Score
foodsec()
Calculate main food security indicators
hhs()
HHS - Household Hunger Scale
if_not_in_stop()
Stop statement "If not in colnames" with colnames
lcsi()
LCSI - Livelihood Coping Strategy Index
rcsi()
rCSI - reduced Coping Strategy Index
roster_wgq_ss()
Prepare dummy variables for each WG-SS component (individual data)
subvec_in()
Subvec in
subvec_not_in()
Subvec not in
